input.sentences: the day spent on the beach was amazing .
the kids all had fun on the edge of the water .
they even learned how to fish .
some of them even caught fish | though they were small .
at the end of the day | everyone had fun .
output.sentences: Time could never be spent any better, with the grand kids at the beach.
My beautiful grand baby had plenty of fun in the water and sun.
She even got the chance to learn how to fish.
It took a while, but eventually, we caught a fish!
The fun filled day ended with the girls eating a Popsicle.
